alternatives.transcript: no one was joking in Spokane Washington on April fools day nineteen ninety six

first a bomb went off outside the office of a local newspaper then another inside a bank two armed men entered and robbed the bank of fifty thousand dollars it was apparently the work of well trained criminals but one of the bombers made a crucial mistake
a simple pair of jeans he was wearing that day would later reveal his identity

nestled in the fault of the Spokane river the city of Spokane Washington is the cultural and economic center of an area known as the inland northwest which includes parts of Washington Idaho Montana and Oregon
the region is known for its beautiful countryside and for being home to many right wing groups openly hostile to the government of the United States
at two thirty six on the afternoon of April first nineteen ninety six one of these groups made its presence known in Spokane
an employee at a branch office of the local newspaper the spokesman review
noticed a bomb with a lighted fuse just outside the building's rear door
as he ran inside to call police the bomb explodes
shredding doors shattering windows and filling the building with smoke
as employees fled the building police rushed to the scene they found extensive damage but no one was injured
at two forty seven just eleven minutes after the spokesman review bombing police got another call
there's been another explosion this time inside the U. S. bank branch only thirty blocks away
bank surveillance camera showed two men entering the bank witnesses said a third man waited outside in a getaway van the man inside the bank for Parkers and ski masks to hide their identities
they were heavily armed at gun point they ordered tellers to put money in bags

after that occurred %HESITATION and they got apparently the money that they believed was available %HESITATION one of the robbers left a pipe bomb on the counter the bank and let it and then %HESITATION I told everybody to evacuate the bank that it I think the comment was made by one of the witnesses that they said get out it's going to blow or something similar to that
the bomb scene in this surveillance shot exploded
it tore through the building shattering windows counters indoors again amazingly no one was hurt
yes the teller had been standing there she could've been killed or severely injured
%HESITATION and people inside the bank could been severely injured from the shrapnel as it flew
investigators were now connecting the two bombings
since the blast came so close together police were convinced the first bomb was a diversion designed to draw attention away from the bank robbery
it was clearly a well planned and well executed crime
these people really knew what they were doing and also there was no question when late they went inside that bank these were not amateurs they had planned this
later is left behind at both bombings left no doubt that they were related
the letters which promised more violence had a symbol at the bottom
combination of the letter P. and the cross
it was a symbol of the Phineas priesthood a highly armed extremely violent right wing terrorist group that had declared a holy war against the United States government
two bombings on the same day in Spokane Washington left massive damage and the community that feared there would be more violence to come
as bomb experts dug through the rubble they found letters the bombers had purposely left behind
two experts on domestic terrorism the letters spoke volumes
they contain symbols that identified the bombers as members of the Phineas priesthood
the priesthoods creed is an unusual combination of biblical prophecy and violence a radical right wing view of America combined with the strictly conservative interpretation of scripture
the result of fanatical hatred of government and the rationale for violence
they want to destroy America do to save it they don't believe in reform in America they believe that the whole system is rotten and needs to be basically torn down so that we can start over again
David knight were studied the Phineas priesthood for his book in god's country
he says the group takes its name from an Old Testament story about a man named Phineas kills an interracial couple
the essence of the Phineas priesthood is that
people who violate god's laws %HESITATION deserve to be killed
news that the priesthood had targeted Spokane terrified the city and had everyone including law enforcement preparing for the worst

this was the most serious crime probably that's ever happened in Spokane from a danger to the entire community obviously you have serial murders and a lot of murder cases and so on but this case head you know people in fear they were terrorized
police now knew the name of the group but not the names of the bombers
FBI analyst went over images from the bank surveillance cameras
the images were shot once every second making for a disconnected sequence but when frozen and enlarged the individual images were extraordinarily clean
these pictures

were some of the best that I've ever seen in the laboratory because they were high quality thirty five millimeter black and white photographs and the individual in question was standing so close to the camera that he filled a large part of the frame
border group gave an F. B. I. photograph analyst attempted to measure the bombers high
he used a process known as prospective analysis in which the tiles on the bank's floor
addition of the surveillance camera and the height of the teller counters were all used to measure the dimensions of everything in the image
analysts concluded the robber was approximately five feet six and a half inches tall
this information was relayed to officers in Spokane
but then on July twelfth just three months after the first attack there was another bomb
this time the target was this Planned Parenthood clinic

after their branch office in Spokane Washington was targeted in two separate bomb attacks U. S. bank officials put up a one hundred thirty thousand dollar reward for any information on members of the Phineas priesthood the group that claimed responsibility for the attacks
meanwhile analysts examine the pipe bomb that nearly destroyed Spokane's Planned Parenthood clinic
that bomb caused unbelievable damage to the Planned Parenthood the director Planned Parenthood from New York came out said this was the worst bombing that it ever happened a Planned Parenthood clinic
the bomb was wrapped with buckshot
this made it more deadly but also more identifiable
most buckshot is made from recycled car batteries which makes for a lot of impurities all of which can be identified
FBI analyst Kathleen Monday took shavings from the buckshot found at the bomb site
the shavings are dissolved in a neutral chemical solution
this solution is then vaporized at extremely high temperatures the rate of vaporization is then fed to a computer which identifies the buckshot to basic chemical components

compared to my years of experience the buckshot in this case had extremely high levels of these impurities and the chemical or elemental makeup of this buckshot was I'd say distinctive compared to others that I've analyzed
if this buckshot could be traced investigators might get a lead on the bombers identities
but then a solid lead came from informants anxious to receive the reward
one of the people that the

the informant identified three men burn J. Morell Robert Barry and Charles Barkley all living in Sandpoint Idaho
the informant had one more piece of information the trio was planning their next banquette for October eighth the target a U. S. bank branch in Portland Oregon
the FBI immediately began background checks and surveillance on the three men
they found that Morales fifty one trained as a nuclear engineer left his career and moved to Idaho to devote all his time to the Phineas priesthood
berry forty two owned a struggling truck repair shop and spent most of his time and money on anti government activities

Barbie forty four had quit his job at A. T. and T. years earlier investigators suspected he might be the bomber in this surveillance image records indicated Barbie was five feet six and five eighths inches tall fractions away from analyst estimates of the bomber's actual height
on October eighth the man who were being watched by investigators using long distance surveillance equipment look at their vehicle with automatic rifles and grenade launchers and left for Portland
before the trio arrived in Portland FBI officials called the U. S. bank branch and told them to lock their doors
agents watched as the trio waited outside the bank in their van
they saw people going up to the doors checking the doors
but nobody was getting and so that the bank got a phone call that said are you open and they said no
we assume it was from a cell phone inside the vehicle
stymied in their plans the man drove away

they would have been prepared for anything had we tried to stop them on the highway and they were gonna have a shoot out

infirmary health home they found a Hewlett Packard inkjet color printer consistent with the one that printed the letter sent to the Planned Parenthood clinic
in Robert Parry's truck repair business they found what appeared to be the same buckshot used in the Planned Parenthood bombing

after the arrest of three men in the Spokane bombings and robberies investigators look for conclusive evidence to tie them to the crimes
the buckshot found in Robert Parry's truck repair business was subjected to the same analysis as buckshot attached to the bomb that destroyed Spokane's Planned Parenthood clinic
chemically I couldn't tell the buckshot recovered from the bombing apart from the buckshot recovered from the business they were chemically the same
but prosecutors wanted something even more conclusive was there a way to use the bank surveillance images to clearly identify at least one of the robbers
was it possible that these two images which were particularly clear with the suspect Charles Barkley
the robber was covered head to toe black is blue jeans were clearly identifiable
almost all blue jeans are made of white cotton that is then dyed blue how that blue dye wears off particularly on the scenes can be distinctive
a sort of hill and valley effect is created hi parts of the scene turned white while the lower parts retain their color
the fit of the jeans and the posture of the person wearing them can create unique patrons almost like a bar code that appears along these scenes

this man was photographed from the same distance and in the same position as the bank's surveillance photo of the man thought to be Charles Barkley it enables me to get them positioned in a way that most closely approximates what the %HESITATION bank robbers posture was it also enables me to to try and replicate the draping of the %HESITATION clothing as closely as possible in a process called point by point analysis the photos are broken down into sections and each section is analyzed for distinctive features
then the two sets of photos those showing the jeans worn by the bank robber and those taken from the suspect's home

and so it's very strong circumstantial evidence Bobby couldn't have known it but the jeans he wore during the first bank robbery
help identify him and his fellow bombers in March of nineteen ninety seven the trio went on trial
